wybug_title: 快乐购物分站信息泄露可查看bash_history
wybug_corp: 快乐购物股份有限公司
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2012-09-23：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2012-09-24：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2012-10-04：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2012-10-14：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2012-10-24：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2012-11-07：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 快乐购物分站信息泄露可查看bash_history 详细说明：  http://m.happigo.com/.bash_history   漏洞证明：  http://m.happigo.com/.bash_history
curl http://m.happigo.com/.bash_historymkdir tuowlogcd tuowlog/lsls -alcd ..lsvi tuowlog.shlsls -alcd -lspwdcd /Data/code/waplsvi tuowlog.shlscd -cd -cd -cd ..lscat wap.happigo.com_access_log.$ed|grep "cps_id=17"cat wap.happigo.com_access_log20100915|grep "cps_id=17"cat wap.happigo.com_access_log.20100915|grep "cps_id=17"pwdlscd -cd /Data/code/wapls -alchmod 777 tuowlog.sh ./tuowlog.sh cd -lsls -alpwdcd -lscat tuowlog.sh lsls -alls *.shls -al *.shcat cutlog.sh rm -fr tuowlog.sh mv cutlog.sh tuowlog.shvi tuowlog.sh vim tuowlog.sh vim tuowlog.sh vim tuowlog.sh lsmv  tuowlog.sh cutlog.shls -al tuowlog.sh chmod 700 tuowlog.sh cd /Data/app/httpd-2.2.14/logs/tuowlog/lsrm *lsrm -fr *.loglsrm -fr *.log?lscd -ls./tuowlog.sh cd -ls -alcat s_url.20100914.log lsrm *.loglslspwdcd -lsrm -fr cutlog.sh cat cronphp.sh crontab -lpwd./tuowlog.sh cd -cat s_url.20100914.log lscrontab -elscd -lsls -alcd uclscd ..lsls tuowlog.sh lscd -cd ..lscd /Data/app/httpd-2.2.14/logs/tuowlog/lsls -alcat s_url.20100915.log crontab -lcd -lscat cronphp.sh cd wapmanager/lscd -lscd /Data/app/httpd-2.2.14/logs/tail -f wap.happigo.com-error_log.20100916tail -f wap.happigo.com-error_log.20100916tail -f wap.happigo.com-error_log.20100916
